title: Vegetarian Asian noodle salad
ingredients: ['4 eggs', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1/2 large onion, sliced', '1 large courgette, julienned', '400g tofu, drained and cubed', '1 clove garlic', '7 red chilli peppers, chopped', '3 tablespoons fish sauce', '4 tablespoons lime juice', '2/3 teaspoon sugar', '1/3 teaspoon salt', '1L water', '225g rice noodles', '1/2 head lettuce, chopped']
